Detailed Description

A 3D vector class.

float  y,
float  z 
)

This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts. Creates and inititializes the vector with 3 floats.

Creates and inititializes the vector with a DzPnt3

DzVec3::DzVec3 ( const DzVec3 &  v  ) 

This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts. Copy Constructor.

float DzVec3::getAngleTo ( const DzVec3 &  vec  )  const

Returns the angle between the two vectors. Sign of the angle is such that, when applied, will swing the first vector (this) into the second (argument).

DzQuat DzVec3::getRotationTo ( const DzVec3 &  vec  )  const
Returns:
The rotation that will swing this vector into the given vector.

DzVec3 DzVec3::linearInterp ( float  t,
const DzVec3 &  vec1,
const DzVec3 &  vec2 
) [static]

Performs a linear interpolation between v1 and v2 based on the value of t. t=0.0 will return v1, t=1.0 will return v2. Values outside the 0.0 <= t <= 1.0 range may also be used to return an extrapolated vector
